TEXT.TITLE: TRITON ENERGY <OIL> PRESIDENT RESIGNS
TEXT.BODY: Triton Energy Corp said president Thomas Goff resigned. The company gave no reason for the resignation. It said chairman and chief executive officer William Lee will assume the role of president until a replacement has been found. Reuter
